query:
SELECT 
  'Total' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM matches
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Upcoming', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchStarted = 0 AND matchEnded = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Live', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchStarted = 1 AND matchEnded = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Completed', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchEnded = 1;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2EKhjpwgmHfHvW4.4164de301b73 --database aHKMyW7q8Yzq4ixgg6hEiM --execute SELECT 
  'Total' as category, COUNT(*) as count FROM matches
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Upcoming', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchStarted = 0 AND matchEnded = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Live', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchStarted = 1 AND matchEnded = 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Completed', COUNT(*) FROM matches WHERE matchEnded = 1;
